list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The car was travelling at high speed.

list_definition.definition: (past tense, past participles spedspedspeeded) to (cause to) move or progress quickly; to hurry

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The car sped/speeded along the motorway.

list_definition.mean_english: chạy quá tốc độ quy định
list_definition.definition: (past tense, past participle speeded) to drive very fast in a car etc, faster than is allowed by law

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The policeman said that I had been speeding.
